gen:link.label:label: The sum of the "Index/Unit Linked Assets" from template IR.06.02 - template IR.06.02 - List of assets and "Index/Unit Linked Derivatives" from template IR.08.01 - Open derivatives, should be equal or less than the value of the item "Assets held for index-linked and unit-linked contracts" reported on the template IR.02.01 - Balance sheet. Please note, however, that also liabilities, other than derivatives, may exist and if material, could lead to the balance-sheet figure being less than the sum of IR.06.02 and IR.08.01.

The sum of the "Index/Unit Linked Assets" from template IR.06.02 - template IR.06.02 - List of assets and "Index/Unit Linked Derivatives" from template IR.08.01 - Open derivatives, should be equal or less than the value of the item "Assets held for index-linked and unit-linked contracts" reported on the template IR.02.01 - Balance sheet. Please note, however, that also liabilities, other than derivatives, may exist and if material, could lead to the balance-sheet figure being less than the sum of IR.06.02 and IR.08.01.
